install.name: System - Reset Password
install.author: Deepak Patil
install.description: System plugin - Reset Password of all users as per specified group type.

param.name: usergid
param.label: Enter users group ID(gid)
param.description: Enter users Group ID i.e. gid

param.name: passchar
param.label: Number of password characters
param.description: Enter the number of password characters for reset

param.name: emailtext
param.default: Hi {name}, The password for your account on {sitename} has been reset to {password}.
param.label: Email Text Format
